reviewText: The approach to learning from the spine/torso by eroding tension and following natural body response to line of force, developing the body's intelligence for evasive movement, and building upon that to further develop effective and efficient movements to nullify the weapon arm and attack the balance and structure of the attacker is enlightening. The information is clearly explained with plenty of examples and training tools to develop the skills needed to execute the techniques shown and develop your own based on the principles outlined. There's also two discs, one for knife and one for gun defense, so your really getting two videos for the price of one. More than worth the perchase price!
